name: SEOAuditPro
description: An AI‑powered SEO Auditor that crawls a user‑provided website, analyses on‑page SEO factors, evaluates the backlink profile, checks compliance with major search‑engine guidelines, and produces a prioritized, markdown‑formatted optimization report for the site owner or digital marketer.

tools.name: crawl_website
tools.description: Crawls the given website up to a specified depth and returns a list of discovered pages with their URLs and raw HTML content. Respects robots.txt and optional timeout.

url.description: The root URL of the website to crawl, e.g., https://example.com

depth.description: Maximum link‑depth to follow from the root URL (default 2).

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time allowed for crawling in seconds (default 60).

tools.name: fetch_backlinks
tools.description: Queries a third‑party backlink service (e.g., Ahrefs, Majestic) to retrieve the backlink profile for the target domain. Returns a list of backlinks with source URL, domain authority and anchor text.

domain.description: The domain to retrieve backlinks for, e.g., example.com

max_results.description: Maximum number of backlink entries to return (default 100).

tools.name: run_seo_checks
tools.description: Performs on‑page SEO analysis on a collection of pages. Checks title tags, meta descriptions, heading hierarchy, image alt attributes, page speed hints, mobile‑friendliness, and schema markup. Returns a structured list of issues and improvement suggestions per page.

pages.description: Array of page objects to analyse.

html.description: Raw HTML source of the page.

tools.name: generate_report
tools.description: Compiles all gathered data (on‑page issues, backlink analysis, guideline compliance) into a markdown‑formatted SEO audit report with priority scores, actionable recommendations, and a brief executive summary.

site_url.description: Root URL of the audited site.

guideline_violations.description: Any violations of major search‑engine guidelines (e.g., Google Core Web Vitals, structured‑data errors).

examples.description: User requests a full SEO audit of their website; the assistant crawls the site, fetches backlinks, runs on‑page checks, and returns a markdown report.
